general.gigTitle: develop a custom wordpress website for you

sellerCard.oneLiner: Computer Engineer, Web Designer and Developer
sellerCard.description:
Hi there, my name is Arif and Iâ€™m from Ankara, Turkey. I am Computer Engineer and also Certified Pro Web developer in Fiverr. Now i'm providing custom pro WordPress services on Fiver with my two team member.

After graduating from Computer Engineering in 2008, I worked in various institutions and companies and started freelancing in 2011 when I set up my own company. I specialise in web design and development and love what I do! 

My skills are: web and mobile ui design, front-end development and WordPress theme development.

description.content:
Hi I'm Arif, a web designer and developer located in Ankara, Turkey. I have been creating websites for over 10 years. Last 8 years creating WordPress themes.


WHAT WILL YOU GET ? ( All Packages Include )


  1. Custom UI Design ( Using Adobe Photoshop and XD / I'll share you preview link)
  2. Modern Front-End Technologies (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap 4)
  3. Image optimization and cache setting for the fastest loading.
  4. Responsive web design with fast loading pages and "mobile first" technique
  5. WordPress Theme Integration with Elementor ( Customizable every part with Elementor. If you don't want to use any page builder. I can do it from scratch for premium package. )
  6. Launching your WordPress site on your web hosting and domain.



WHAT'S THE PROCESS?


  1. Contact me first please and we can chat before begin the project. I want to a brief document for the defining goals.

  3. After defining the goals and features needed for the website, i'll give a custom offer or you can buy a gig package for your project.

  5. When i finished the your web site i'll send you demo link for you.

  7. When everything is ready to go, i'll launched your site in your hosting and domain and after that i'll deliver the project files.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can we talk about the project before ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes we can talk about the project via Skype..

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is PRO Gig ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Anyone with a Fiver PRO logo on their profile. You can hire them and you can feel confident yes he/she is a qualified person.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How we start project ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Always you must send me message for your project detail and requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer support and maintenance ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I try to give some support for you. I've lots of customer in Turkey and other countries and i try to give answers their questions with politely. But support doesn't mean adding extra feature for your web sites.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is it responsive ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes always.. Nowadays mobile phones usage more than the others and i try to be careful about testing moblie screens.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you launch the web site on my hosting ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i can launch the web site to your hosting, if you give me cpanel/plesk panel info.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is it easy manage my web site ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes it is very easy. You can manage all part of your web site via WordPress CMS and elementor page builder.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: This is for small business and startup. Focusing for your startup business.

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: This is for larger than the small business.Need for more than 5 pages.

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: Fully custom design and functionality. Focusing online marketing and selling something online.

reviews.comment: My website design project was the first one I have tried with fiverr -- I came to this project with very specific ideas what I wanted as a complex demanding site ... Arif worked with me (despite the limitations imposed by fiverr email) to understand and duplicate my intentions, and he has done it very very well.  I have faith that his performance is based on a deep desire to meet my needs as best as possible -- I have been quite pleased working with him and will do so again, happily!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for your all nice comment, rating and for huge tip.. it was my pleasure working with you.. Thank you again..

reviews.comment: Arif Evren was an absolute pleasure to work withâ€”always delivering TOP-NOTCH quality with professionalism and a quick turnaround. His expertise in website development really shines through. Highly recommend! ðŸ™Œ

seller_response.comment: Thank you very much..it was my pleasure

reviews.comment: Quick to jump on this issue and fix it quickly

reviews_snippet.comment:
We've been working with Arif for a couple of years now, and he always delivers great results. He built our landing pages in Elementor with awesome attention to detail and super quick responses. Communication is easy and smooth, making the whole process a breeze. We're always happy with the outcomes.

Looking forward to teaming up again in the future!

My website design project was the first one I have tried with fiverr -- I came to this project with very specific ideas what I wanted as a complex demanding site ... Arif worked with me (despite the limitations imposed by fiverr email) to understand and duplicate my intentions, and he has done it very very well.  I have faith that his performance is based on a deep desire to meet my needs as best as possible -- I have been quite pleased working with him and will do so again, happily!

Excellent programmer - Arif took two complicated designs from Adobe Illustrator and created two functional Wordpress websites for our company. His work was very professional and he kept us informed of his progress even over the holidays. Highly recommended!

Arif is incredibly talented. Was able to build out our site with with a very high degree of accuracy.   Very responsive and was able to jump on a Google meets and send screen recordings to complete the project.   

Was able to work around my existing wordpress theme, upgrade our security and integrate more plugins to get us exactly what we needed.
This is my 5th project with Arif and he's 5 out of 5 stars every time!  Professional, responsive, and his work is always excellent!
